global.title: U-Dig It AI Performance Alerts Playbook
global.description: Framework for automated alerts when funnel performance metrics drop or exceed thresholds.
global.guardrails: Alerts must include context and recommended actions. Avoid false alarms by requiring consistent data dips before firing.

recommendations: Check landing page headline and CTA performance.
Run A/B test on offer summary page.
Review ad targeting for lead quality.
Consider a downsell offer or pause option.
Review landing page load speed and CTA placement.
Check refund requests for common themes.
Ensure refund guarantee is clear but not over-inviting abuse.

revenue_drop.alert_message: ⚠️ Revenue dropped 20% compared to last week.
recommendations: Ensure Stripe links and checkout are functioning properly.

integration.escalation_rules: If same metric fails 3 consecutive checks, escalate to critical alert with immediate action required.
